programme.desc: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel whereShrekand Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounterLord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom Ep1
programme.desc: Megamind: The Button Of Doom - After one "button" unleashes the gigantic robot MEGA-MEGAmind on Metro City, MegaMind and Minion must rely on their old tricks to restore order.

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before its gone forever!

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Rescue Riders Huttsgalor Holiday Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday - When a series of unpredictable winter storms threaten to ruin Odinyule, the Viking holiday of giving, the Rescue Riders must figure out how to save the holiday.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep40
programme.desc: Chompers For Cobcorn / Boat Day - Bernard steals Rabbits teeth and when Berry gets mistaken as an accomplice, they go on the run together. / Berrys head grows to monstrous size and keeps growing.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert and the Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out with spectacular results.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep49
programme.desc: What's That Green Hairy Stuff? - Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep50
programme.desc: How Can I Find My Friends? - Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special Follow the Clues surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep23
programme.desc: Olivia Acts Out - It's time for the annual school play, but Olivia's stuck playing the part of Cow #2, while Francine lands the starring role. It's up to Olivia to make the most of her small part: with a little help from Julian, she choreographs a climactic mooove for herself and has the crowd on their feet.

programme.title: Olivia Ep24
programme.desc: Olivia And The School Concert - The theme of this year's school concert is Fantastic Fruits and Vibrant Vegetables, and Olivia couldn't be more thrilled. But poor Julian can't bear the thought of singing his celery song in front of an audience. With a little imagination and some quick thinking, Olivia helps him overcome his stage fright.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.desc: Not My Boy Brandon / Shady Shawn - Tip and Oh get an annoying "tagalong" friend who won't leave them alone/The Tucci's go camping with Lucy's new boyfriend

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep31
programme.desc: Battle of the Babies / Norman - Rocksys rapport with Lindsay and Brehts now feral baby inspires her friends to get their own babies, and then make them fight. / Twig and Leaf reunite with their brother Norman and compete to win his affection. But the intentions of Norman, along with a fourth hidden brother named Shanks, are malicious.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert and the Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert and the Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep25
programme.desc: Olivia And The Family Photo - Mother is determined to take the perfect family Christmas photo in the middle of the summer. With the help of a snow machine, Olivia takes it upon herself to bring a little Christmas spirit to the photograph, and to Francine's backyard beach party next door.

programme.title: Olivia Ep1
programme.desc: Olivia Plays The Piano - Olivia sees herself as a great concert pianist, though her piano teacher thinks she needs a little more practice. But when her little brother Ian begins taking his own piano lessons and turns out to be pretty good Olivia isn't sure if there's room for two prodigies in the family.

programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Nubble trouble / Bouncing Boulders - Bobbi befriends a hungry alien he calls 'Nubble', but things soon go wrong after she eats junk aboard the Deer Squad's space station. // Kai and Lola compete to set a mountain climbing record but disturbs some giant boulders on Frost Mountain.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bay / Pups Save a Goodway - Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay. // When Adventure Bays famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Dora's Royal Rescue - Dora and Boots and the noble horse, Rocinante, are off to Story Castle to rescue Don Quixote from the evil wizard, Malambruno.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Cecilia And The Ghost Ship - Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humsquatch / Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc - Travelling Travis yelps for help when he finds a mysterious creature in trouble. The PAW Patrol heads to Foggy Bottom to save a Humsquatch! // When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the PAW Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: William vs. Wild - After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Space Station Mystery / Crystal Cracks - Strange things begin happening on board the space station. Deer Squad investigates and discovers there is a prankster on board - Trickalien! // Jade discovers a Time Crystal and she is forced to learn how to use it to turn back time!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pick and Chew / Mr. Bossy and Mr. Turtle / Dance Like Everyone's Watching - Bossy, Turtle and Bissy are overwhelmed when Mom and Dad let them order at a pizza place. // Miss Elky lets Bossy and Turtle take over for the day. // Turtle is afraid to dance in front of a huge crowd.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save the Funhouse - When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Greens - Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po pick delicious green beans. The Noo-noo puts the beans into the Tubby Custard Machine and out comes tasty, green Tubby Custard!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Kite - Dee encourages a friend to say 'kite' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a flying kite, a roaring kite, a dragon kite and even a snoring kite!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Howdy There Hooper - The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Cavity Cave - Messy brushes his teeth, but why must we use toothpaste and a toothbrush to get teeth clean? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep63
programme.desc: Fun With Clouds - A family trip for Monty is ruined by the cloudy weather, and they all wish they would disappear, until Monty and Jimmy take another approach.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Footprint Badge - The squirrels are playing hide-and-seek, but they can't find Happy. The squirrels follow lots of different footprints that take them to their friend but there is one set they can't work out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Juice Badge - Duggee is going to make the squirrels juice from the garden. Whilst picking the fruit, the squirrels meet a little bug, full of woes about being too small.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Shape Badge - It is a lovely day and the squirrels are playing outside. They are playing the shape game. Working out which shape goes where is quite tricky.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tower Bridge, London - Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Panama Canal, Panama - Glitch sinks in the Panama Canal and needs saving... again.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep22
programme.desc: The Pool - Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Blue Mountains - Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep4
programme.desc: River Chub - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to North America in search of a river chub that builds an underwater nest with over 7000 pebbles.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Grace's Favourite Machines - Grace looks at back at her favourite machines that are cool, useful and thrilling!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain - The Musical - In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Terracotta Army, China - Can the Go Jetters stop Glitch's noisy guitar and save the Terracotta Army in China?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Christmas Island, Indian Ocean - The Go Jetters snap into action as Glitch seeks some festive cheer on Christmas Island.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Being Percy - Percy decides to imitate wise old Gordon in order to win the respect of the other engines.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Auto Cat - Duck has some competition for Sarah's attention when a brand new toy arrives.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Twang Ball - Scarf Lady introduces Sarah and Duck to a new game involving knitted sporting equipment.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Sunny Spotlights - The sun shows special things to Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Dog Loves Balancing - Pug and Dog arrive at the circus, where they meet the Great Splendina. She believes that she cannot swing from the trapeze but she rescues Dog from a fall and helps Pug complete his walk on the tightrope.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep2
programme.desc: It's Time For a Community Jam - At the community jam, everyone makes music together. Gran Gran gives JoJo a shaker to join in with the band, but with Charlene stuck in traffic, JoJo might need to sing too!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Home Away From Home - A sleepover at Finn's would be great fun if Herman wasn't feeling so homesick.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Room to Dance - A Citizen Po can't help bumping into the furniture of his little house as he practices his dancing.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep28
programme.desc: The News Badge - After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep27
programme.desc: The Ball Badge - The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Gua Rusa, Borneo - When Grandmaster Glitch discovers his Halloween pumpkin isn't as big as the Grimbots' one, he goes in search of some fertilizer to help it grow.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Wind Power - The Go Jetters race to save Glitch when his kite flies too close to the Academy wind farm.

programme.desc: A ground-breaking investigative documentary that explores the impact humans are having on wild dolphins through hand feeding tourism programs at Monkey Mia and Bunbury in WA, and Moreton Bay and Tin Can Bay in Queensland.

programme.title: Danielle's Pacific Break
programme.desc: In the Pacific it's hard for women to launch careers in the music industry, but when singer-songwriter Danielle wins the region's biggest music competition, it kickstarts her breakout year.

programme.title: Compass - Sacred Space - The Franciscan of Parramatta Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Vincent Long is Australia's first Vietnamese Catholic bishop. A survivor of clerical sex abuse, he is committed to supporting other survivors, refugees and LGBTQI people.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep250
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep235
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Whatever the day brings we come together to talk through the issues, share stories and find understanding, support, comfort and a sense of community by listening to the opinions of other people. (Final for 2023)

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Coral Triangle is a region spanning Indonesia to the Solomon Islands. We look at the habitats and areas of a coral reef and how each zone within this complex and delicately balanced ecosystem hothouses life forms.

programme.title: Australian Story - Making a Scene - Claudia Karvan Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Actor and producer Claudia Karvan speaks openly about her chaotic childhood and the challenges of managing her late father's mental illness. And she reveals how she mines her unconventional life for her drama.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. Republican candidates take on frontrunner Donald Trump, while Joe Biden is running for re-election. Chas and John guide you along the way. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: If You're Listening Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The world is on fire. Inflation is through the roof, and AI is taking our jobs. What does it all mean? Matt Bevan explains the biggest story in world news while hiding in his basement from assassins and authoritarian regimes.

programme.title: The World Ep250
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland for some island-hopping fun and encounters a green sea turtle laying her eggs, a pack of wild dingoes on the hunt and a snake with a terrifying name - death adder, lying in ambush.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Liz and Willie Cook are expanding their empire, but with ever-increasing debt. On the eve of his first muster, an aerial survey for cattle gives Clarry Shadforth a rude shock. Kurt Hammar rounds up the deal of the season.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, The Business team look back at some of the best stories and big issues that we covered in 2023 in business, the economy, housing, finance, and consumer affairs.

programme.title: Outback Musical
programme.desc: Outback students scattered across sheep and cattle properties overcome distance, drought and disability to put on a show from home as they realise their dreams, dancing, bull-riding and lawn bowling towards the big night.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Coral Triangle is a region spanning Indonesia to the Solomon Islands. We look at the habitats and areas of a coral reef and how each zone within this complex and delicately balanced ecosystem hothouses life forms.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia is home to some of the deadliest predators in the world. The island continent is notorious for playing host to the most venomous snakes, the most deadly crocodiles, spiders and jellyfish.

programme.title: China Tonight - Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories and interviews from China Tonight in 2023, as we explore the complexity, history, culture and people who make China a superpower.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia - It's Time! (1960 - 1975) Ep2

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we look back at some of the best Landline stories from 2023. More to cherries than a Christmas treat; Kids on camp honing cattle skills; and imperfect produce becomes gourmet dried fruit.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep100
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: The Business - Summer Special Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, The Business team look back at some of the best stories and big issues that we covered in 2023 in business, the economy, housing, finance, and consumer affairs.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep48
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Desert Daredevils: The Finke Desert Race
programme.desc: Follow these fearless competitors as they test their limits, and risk their lives, in what is widely considered Australia's most extreme off road race, in the heart of Central Australia.

programme.title: In Conversation with Sachin Tendulkar
programme.desc: A masterclass with the Little Master. Paul Kennedy travelled to India for an exclusive one-on-one conversation with Sachin Tendulkar covering his batting technique, aggressive play, focus and deep love of cricket.

programme.title: Andrew Olle Media Lecture - Leigh Sales Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - One of Australia's most respected journalists, Leigh Sales, delivers the Andrew Olle Media Lecture, covering the themes of news avoidance, loss of trust in the media, and why, like many people, she is being affected by both.

programme.title: Landline Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we look back at some of the best Landline stories from 2023. More to cherries than a Christmas treat; Kids on camp honing cattle skills; and imperfect produce becomes gourmet dried fruit.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Amy Culpitt takes a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep51
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Kathryn Robinson, plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Year In Review Special Ep48
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes bring you a weekly hit of Pacific joy as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage from Australia and around the world. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep45
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Join Lisa Millar, Bridget Brennan, Emma Rebellato, Tony Armstrong and Nate Byrne for the best conversations as we hear from some of the big names and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep37
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa makes a spinning compost bin; Jerry talks edible tree leaves; Hannah propagates hedges; Clarence sows desert peas; Millie meets a pair of foodie gardeners; Josh plants watermelon; and we visit a botanist's dream garden.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Amy Culpitt takes a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: China Tonight - Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories and interviews from China Tonight in 2023, as we explore the complexity, history, culture and people who make China a superpower.

programme.title: Dolphins: Is Our Love Too Deep?
programme.desc: A ground-breaking investigative documentary that explores the impact humans are having on wild dolphins through hand feeding tourism programs at Monkey Mia and Bunbury in WA, and Moreton Bay and Tin Can Bay in Queensland.

programme.title: Bradman And Tendulkar
programme.desc: Two of cricket's greatest players, sporting icons from different corners of the world. This documentary compares their early lives, stellar careers and dreams, uncovering striking similarities and never-before-shared details.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan Ep46
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: Outback Musical
programme.desc: Outback students scattered across sheep and cattle properties overcome distance, drought and disability to put on a show from home as they realise their dreams, dancing, bull-riding and lawn bowling towards the big night.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The race to the 2024 Presidential Election is on. Republican candidates take on frontrunner Donald Trump, while Joe Biden is running for re-election. Chas and John guide you along the way. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC National News Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. We have reporters on the ground following the story and the issues that matter.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Savannah Survivors Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin visits the savannah for an encounter with Australia's largest predatory bird, a wedge-tailed Eagle, one of the world's most venomous snakes - the coastal taipan and a real-life dragon - the frill-necked lizard.

programme.title: Decoding Danger - Floods Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia is shaped by great storms, extreme heat, and an epic cycle of boom and bust. Life on the island continent has evolved accordingly, to survive drought and flooding rains. How can we learn to survive and thrive?

programme.title: The Dark Emu Story
programme.desc: A thought-provoking and inspiring documentary that charts the impact of Bruce Pascoe's Dark Emu - the publishing phenomenon that challenged Australia to rethink its history and ignited a debate that continues to rage.

programme.title: Project Wild - Tonga Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Art Works - Lindy Lee, Halo Vocal Ensemble Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - This week we find inspiration with Lindy Lee; meet Halo Vocal Ensemble and art influenced by dogs; Namila chats with Jordy van den Nieuwendijk; and the latest in our Instrumental Series with Koto master Satsuki Odamura.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Matter of Minutes (Update) - Mick O'Dowd Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Mick O'Dowd has survived the unimaginable. He came close to death but lived. Three years after first telling his story, Mick is reclaiming his life and is back doing the things he loves.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Outback Musical
programme.desc: Outback students scattered across sheep and cattle properties overcome distance, drought and disability to put on a show from home as they realise their dreams, dancing, bull-riding and lawn bowling towards the big night.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2023 Heywire project. Hosted by Isaac Muller.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep101
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Breaking the Code: Cyber Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Australian spies are on the offensive against cyber criminal networks and foreign actors seeking to disrupt democracies. But our intelligence agencies have a long history playing a key role in secret battles.

programme.desc: Tanaka Ryosuke and Miyachi Yoh use offcut lumber for furniture. But using multiple boards can lead to uneven color, so they dye their work with indigo; a clever idea that's attracting real interest.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: The Star Festival
programme.desc: For the annual Tanabata Star Festival, families across Edo flew bamboo stalks adorned with strips of paper and ornaments representing wishes. We examine what their wishes tell us about their lives.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at bladed tools. Traditional techniques are used to make a range of state-of-the-art items.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Sannai Maruyama Site.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: J-Arena
programme.desc: In the sport of Stairclimbing, competitors run up emergency staircases to reach the top of tall buildings in the shortest possible time. We report from the 2023 World Championships held in Osaka.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Remote Onsen: Tohoku In Winter
programme.desc: Visit hot springs hidden away in Aomori, Akita, and Fukushima to experience a variety of healing waters, taste the local cuisine, enjoy the winter landscape, and meet with the locals.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Falconer'S Legacy
programme.desc: Matsubara Hidetoshi, one of Japan's last traditional falconers, resides in rural Tohoku with only the company of his birds. A sudden request by a young city-dweller may be key to retaining his legacy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan
programme.desc: The prefecture of Nagasaki, historically Japan's gateway to the west, has a culture influenced by centuries of foreign trade. With over 1,400 islands, it also makes for a unique cycling experience.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Today'S Close Up
programme.desc: Relentless deforestation is pumping carbon dioxide into the atmosphere and fueling climate change, which in turn is causing further forest loss. We look at the efforts to break this damaging cycle.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Muramasa: Cursed Blade
programme.desc: Unifier of Japan, Shogun Tokugawa Ieyasu wielded a Muramasa blade; a sword thought cursed. It was kept by his family for generations. But why? Japanese sword expert Paul Martin explores the mystery.

programme.title: The Quest For Ancient Color
programme.desc: Japan's Classical period featured stunning natural colors and dyeing techniques. A fifth-generation Kyoto dye craftsman is rediscovering this tradition, resulting in a rich expression of hues.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Kyokusui-no-Utage, poetry with classic Heian elegance. Dive deep into the beauty of the ancient capital, still innovative 1,200 years after its foundation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: lint rollers & rotating beacon lights.

programme.title: Bosai: Human Stampede
programme.desc: During the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake, Tokyo, far from the epicenter, was flooded with people who could not get home. Find out how this could trigger another disaster known as a human stampede.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "Pythagora Equipment Academy"...

programme.title: UFC 295: Procházka vs. Pereira
programme.desc: Prelims - The Worlds Most Famous Arena is the perfect setting for an epic championship doubleheader on November 12, as UFC celebrates its 30th anniversary in Madison Square Garden. In the explosive UFC 295 main event, Jiri Prochazka attempts to regain his 205-pound crown against former middleweight king Alex Pereira in a bout fans have been waiting for. Plus, its another Fight of the Year candidate in the co-main event when Russian powerhouse Sergei Pavlovich takes on British banger Tom Aspinall for the interim UFC heavyweight title.
